doc.title: ieat videos: ieat learns to cook a 62 degree egg!
doc.text: In/IN this/DT final/NN episode/NN of/IN our/PRP$ egg/NN series/NN ,/, we/PRP look/VBP at/IN the/DT 62/JJ degree/NN egg/NN which/WDT is/VBZ very/RB similar/JJ or/CC at/IN least/RB based/VBD on/IN the/DT same/JJ principles/NN as/IN the/DT Onsen/JJ Tamago/NN or/CC Japanese/JJ hot/JJ spring/JJ eggs/NN ./.
